text: 12.8-9 Stt 3.1, 3.4, 3.14, Luk 10.18, 22.31, Jon 12.31, Lep 9.1, 20.2-3 kɨpi awl nɨm ak ensel ne okok sek, kɨli kɨles ma yek, God man ne alaŋ nɨb ñag ju yokel pɨsnep lum awl owlak. God man ne alaŋ yek tek ma yelak. Anɨb ak tek, kɨli God man ne alaŋ ma yenɨgel tek lɨnɨgab. Yoy awl nɨm anɨb ak, Satan nɨm ak. Bɨlel yolɨgup, yɨb ne olap apal, Bɨ takaw yepɨs agup apal. Ne nokom binɨb man okok mɨdupsek kɨlop yepɨs agek, takaw nop ak nɨgɨlak.
